title: How to Draw a Feather

steps.headline: Draw an elongated oval.
steps.description: Draw a line bisecting the oval.

steps.headline: Sketch in details, like the thickness of the middle line and the vane as well.
Outline your feather and erase guidelines.
Draw an elongated oval tilted to the right.
steps.description: Draw a middle diagonal line from the tip of the oval to the base and extending a little outside the oval.

steps.headline: Draw feathery strokes or edgings to the oblong.
Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.

text: Drawing a Traditional Feather Draw an elongated oval. Draw a line bisecting the oval. Sketch in details, like the thickness of the middle line and the vane as well.  Outline your feather and erase guidelines.  Color it.  Drawing a Cartoon Feather Draw an elongated oval tilted to the right. Draw a middle diagonal line from the tip of the oval to the base and extending a little outside the oval. Draw feathery strokes or edgings to the oblong.  Trace with a pen and erase unnecessary lines.  Color to your liking!
